mapper.select: SELECT triggers.trigger_name as triggerName, triggers.trigger_group as triggerGroup, triggers.job_name as jobName, triggers.job_group as jobGroup, job_d.description as jobDescription, job_d.job_class_name as jobClassName, cron_triggers.cron_expression as cronExpression, triggers.trigger_state as triggerState, FROM_UNIXTIME(triggers.start_time/1000,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') as startTime, FROM_UNIXTIME(triggers.end_time/1000,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') as endTime, FROM_UNIXTIME(triggers.next_fire_time/1000,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') as nextFireTime, FROM_UNIXTIME(triggers.prev_fire_time/1000,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') as prevFireTime FROM qrtz_triggers triggers INNER join qrtz_cron_triggers cron_triggers ON (cron_triggers.trigger_name = triggers.trigger_name AND cron_triggers.trigger_group = triggers.trigger_group) INNER JOIN qrtz_job_details job_d ON (job_d.job_name = triggers.job_name AND job_d.job_group = triggers.job_group)
